attributes.action: Bring back Capital Punishment for Murderers, Paedophiles and Rapists
attributes.additional_details:
Too much of tax payers money is being used to keep people who commit these crimes alive in prison.

Technology and Forensic Science has come a long way over the years to ensure only guilty people are punished.

Capital punishment for Murderers, Paedophiles and Rapists should be brought back.
